DOC.brief_summary: This study is undertaken to assess and improve the existing patient flow, or so-called throughput process, in an adult outpatient pain treatment clinic.
DOC.brief_title: The Application of Performance Improvement Principles to the Patient Throughput Process in an Adult Outpatient Pain Treatment Clinic
DOC.criteria: 19100 years of age. patient presenting to the UAB Highlands Pain Treatment Clinic for initial evaluation and treatment or subsequent followup evaluation and treatment. <19 or >100 years of age a current prisoner
